original_title: Josh Groban Bridges: In Concert from Madison Square Garden
overview: Filmed at New Yorkâ€™s Madison Square Garden on November 18, 2018, this new concert features international superstar Josh Groban performing songs from his much-praised recent album Bridges, as well as a selection of classic songs and fan favorites from the last 20 years. Joining him on stage as special guests are Tony Award-winner Idina Menzel and Grammy Award-winner Jennifer Nettles, along with a choir and orchestra.
title: Josh Groban Bridges: In Concert from Madison Square Garden
